name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:

Demonstrated expertise in applying SOLID, DRY, and KISS principles to enhance code quality and maintainability, while implementing design patterns such as Decorators, Factories, and Facades. Skilled in integrating CI/CD practices and refactoring legacy code, ensuring compliance with industry standards. Possesses a strong background in the healthcare and financial domains, building solutions aligned with HIPAA and PCI DSS regulations. A proactive problem-solver, adept at using tools like **GitHub Copilot** to streamline development workflows.
